website_summaries.verdict: Attractive, lightweight, and breathable shoe with nylon spikes for enhanced grip.
pros: Lightweight shoe designed for performance, fit, and comfort during variety of events, including jumps
Newly designed, super lightweight upper featuring hotmelt TPU construction and monomesh
EVA midsole is surrounded by a breathable synthetic and mesh upper, while the nylon spike plate digs in to the ground for a secure fit.Increased durability and traction on all surfaces
cons: Not good for those with flat feet

customer_reviews.title: Great spikes!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter runs track, so I purchased these for her. They are true to size and are very comfortable. The price is good compared to others in local sports stores. I would recommend these spikes, they are very light weight and do help for speed.
customer_reviews.author: MAL

customer_reviews.title: These DO NOT come with spikes!
customer_reviews.text: Even though the picture shows the shoes with spikes, they DO NOT come with spikes! Contacted the seller and they said the description only lists a spike plate. Even though other buyer reviews mention that the spikes come in a bag with a tool. It sounds like they used to come with spikes but no longer do. The description should specify that they don’t have spikes!
customer_reviews.author: Kevio

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Fit Great!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked and fit great. Unfortunately, I had to return them because the sole was not what I expected. A previous pair had a soft rubber sole, this is hard rubber or plastic and does not fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightest track shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. I was amazed when I took them out of the box because of how light they are. Very slender design, very flattering. She said she ran the 200 in practice and noticed s significant difference in her time. Very happy with our decision (after looking at dozens) with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you overpronate
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, lightweight. Lovely shoes but they made my feet overpronate a lot. Maybe good for people with a high stable arch. If you have flexible flat feet like me, not as good.
customer_reviews.author: See you

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BUT SMALL
customer_reviews.text: THESE WERE CUTE BUT WAYYYYYY SMALL!!!! ORDER AT LEAST 2 SIZES UP. The look is nice though but were returned
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me but fit my niece perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My niece runs track and these shoes were too small for me but they fit my niece perfectly. I kept them for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Ally B

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and very light weight and you can't beat the price. I really like the color and style as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby S

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: great fit, true to size, very comfortable, all around great shoe, colors are just as seen in photo and just as bright
customer_reviews.author: Rick Alfera

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about trying a track shoe after spending so much time in Asics big, bulky running shoes, but this one is great. I really like the sleeker profile, and I am lot more comfortable with less rubber between the ground and the soles of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: 24karats

product_meta.title: ASICS Women's Hyper-Rocketgirl 5 Track And Field Shoe
product_meta.description:
Female athletes rejoice in this updated Hyper-Rocketgirl track and field shoe from ASICS. Perfect for distance running, hurdles or jumps, this spike shoe is a great all-around shoe that offers lightweight performance, fit and comfort. The EVA midsole is surrounded by a breathable synthetic and mesh upper, while the nylon spike plate digs in to the ground for a secure fit.

In 1949, Mr. Kihachiro Onitsuka began his athletic footwear company (Onitsuka Co., Ltd.) by manufacturing basketball shoes out of his living room in Kobe, Japan. He chose the name ASICS for his company in 1977, based on a famous Latin phrase "Anima Sana In Corpore Sano," which, when translated, expresses the ancient ideal of "A Sound Mind in a Sound Body." Taking the acronym of this phrase, ASICS was founded on the belief that the best way to create a healthy and happy lifestyle is to promote total health and fitness. Today, ASICS offers a full line of performance-driven athletic shoes and technical active sports apparel and accessories dedicated to bringing harmony to the body and soul.
feature_bullets: Increased durability and traction on all surface.
Enhanced heel and forefoot cushioning and support.
